description:
After being away at school for a while, Lane is back and he's beefed up!
"I've been hitting the gym a little bit more," he said with a smile.
I honestly didn't think he wasn't going to come back. Since his last visit, I'd spoken with him on the phone and we'd exchanged e-mails a few times.
Finally, school let up and he gave me a call.
"I'm ready!" he said.
"So are you wanting to fuck or be fucked?" I asked him.
"You know, I think I'd like to try getting fucked first," he said. "I'm kind of curious."
On the other side of the coin was Troy, who had been fucked silly by Tommy.
He was anxious to show that he could give a good fucking too!
At first, I thought this might be an unlikely pairing. Lane is pretty shy and Troy, well, he's not!
But Lane actually really took to Troy and seemed excited about it.
"He's really funny," Lane told me. "I like the way he looks at things."
Well, they also made a good match in the bedroom. Troy is really good at fucking... nice and deep, with his balls swinging all over the place.
And Lane... well I loved the way he moaned and squirmed while Troy pounded him!
title: Lane & Troy
